results.name: First differences of A002002.
formula: D-finite with recurrence: (n+2)*a(n) +(-7*n-8)*a(n-1) +(7*n-8)*a(n-2) +(-n+2)*a(n-3)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 28 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 04 2011
